fullText: Stephen Adly Guirgis' Pulitzer Prize-winning play gets a Broadway transfer that honors both its intimate character study and its broader social commentary.
dtliExcerpt: Stephen Adly Guirgis' Pulitzer Prize-winning play gets a Broadway transfer that honors both its intimate character study and its broader social commentary.
